places_with_reviews.name: Barrage River Point Badlapur

reviews.text:
Best place to visit in summer season
Safe place for play safe

Good place 😉..
But dangerous for with your group not alone and don't go in deeper side 🙂..

The best place to swim near badlapur kalyan. Google msg will not take you to the exact location so please take help from locals also wear full as it’s natural and u can get cuts here and there. Carry your dabba (tiffin) and just jump in the water and slide your worries away. Don’t go during rainy days the flow will take you along 😊

How to reach here
1. Do not trust Google maps to the fullest ask some locals to reach till the end point
2. You cannot take your vehicle to the end point rather you will have to park it 500m before and there is no vehicle security
3. Strictly no 4 wheelers

The place is good to visit during late summer and start of rainy season it will be a bit of risky during rainy season
Do carry extra clothes and towels in case you are planning for a bath
The sorrounding is a bit dirty and big thanks to visitors who are throwing chips packets and etc while leaving the place

How to enter in the water will be a big question if you are alone and you will definitely need some guidance to get into the center

Overall I feel a great place to take bath on a Sunday morning

If you like fresh fishes there was a guy who was fishing there and sells them, I felt the price was a bit high but ofcourse you can bargaining

Adding couple of pics here

Nice and fun place with peaceful environment. Pls make sure you go at summer time to get the full enjoyment. If you go during other season the water will be above normal level and it will be a waste of time for you and your family.

places_with_reviews.name: Chikloli Dam

reviews.text:
It is one of serene places in badlapur. Very well connected with city, still it has its own natural habitat existence. People go there for peace.
If you visit. Please do not litter the place. Do not disturb the others. Just enjoy the quiet place with yourself... Close your eyes and feel the air cleanse you... Visit is Eve time for sunset. It's very alluring...
It was good but the transport is very weak. Just use your personal vehicle during the ride.
It's peaceful serene beautiful place to visit through out the year 😀 in monsoon it becomes more alive n the views are mind blowing ❤️👌

The Chikloli Dam at Ambernath in the Badlapur region of Thane district, which is around 70 kilometers northeast of Mumbai. It is a concrete gravity dam and serves as a crucial water source for the surrounding areas, including parts of Mumbai.

The dam has a significant storage capacity, which helps in water storage and supply throughout the year. It plays a vital role in catering to the water needs of the local population, especially during the dry months and periods of water scarcity. The reservoir formed by the dam also contributes to the overall water security of the region.

The Chikloli Dam is known for its scenic surroundings and serves as a popular tourist spot for residents and visitors. People often visit the dam to enjoy its picturesque views and engage in recreational activities like picnicking, Fishing.

This place is beautiful. I wish we you visit this place keep clean do not throw plastics in water. I visited this place summer season .This place is very silent 😍 but sometimes MIDC sound desturb you.This place is surrounded by two sides one sides is Hills and forest and another side is MIDC. Mostly people are visit this place in rainy season. Very nice experience.

places_with_reviews.name: Sarvodaya Nagar, Temple
places_with_reviews.address: 56QC+Q37, Jambhul Rd, Dattanagar, Ambernath, Maharashtra 421505, India

reviews.text: Very beautiful temple of Shri Radha Krishna. Nicely decorated interiors. Within a society compound but anyone can come and visit. Place to find some peace.

The Hindu temple is a part of Sarvoday Nagar an  upcoming locality between Ambernath and Badlapur. It's made from red granite stone. The architectural design is kept minimal. To the extent that it brings out the essence of a Hindu temple. The temple artists are working at very slow pace. Hopefully it should be ready by February end.
Newly built and maintained properly. Regular aarti by 7:30 pm.
Good place but far from Ambernath and Badlapur Station
I am living in sarvodaya nagar but still not visited

places_with_reviews.name: Satsang Vihar Badlapur
places_with_reviews.address: 56CW+WV7, near SATSANG VIHAR, Hendre Pada, Badlapur, Maharashtra 421503, India

reviews.text: Satsang is a peaceful place. I use to visit Satsang in Childhood, same vibes. Needs proper maintaince of ground. Must visit during pravachans.
Very good environment surrounded by mango, cheeku, flowers and others also. This is basically made for shree shree Thakur. Good time to spend in this garden.

A one day camp at this close to nature temple made me a fan of this beautiful place spread over 27 acres of land. Primarily visited for prayers, this temple cultivates seasonal fruits and vegetables organically. Some part of the harvest is used by the in-house people and the  rest is available for the public. Those who are interested to purchase such natural fruits and vegetables can connect to me for further details.

Whilst outsiders are not allowed, one of our teachers who is a member of the temple let us in and stay for the entire day.

An enriched day in my life with my NSS students who cleaned the premises and contributed their efforts for enhancing the beauty of the premises.

It's very wonderful and natural place. There is a temple which is devoted to sri sri thakurji. The temple contains gardens with flowers and fruits. Very satisfying and refreshing place. It is a place must visit.

Peace of mind. Thakur ji bless all ..... Calm.. surrounded with nature....  Temple timings evening post 5 pm. Around 6 prayer happens . Prayer time varies every month... The place is one of the major attraction in badlapur....

places_with_reviews.name: Bhoj dam

reviews.text:
It's the safest and the most beautiful dam in badlapur.

Vegetation around is as mesmerizing as the mountains that greet us.

Don't forget to feed the fish that swim around the rocks.

It's fantastic spot with no crowd location 📍 it's best self time spot ☺ which is located near komdeshwar temple badlpur. Here the reflection of mountain range in dams water was fabulous. Tried capture lots of things from there. There is lots various types of flowers which keeps you fresh Nd energetic.
Went here by car.. location is easy to find. 200/300m Walking to reach dam from parking.
It's a awesome place.. you can visit Dam 🦫 In Rainy season as well as in Initial winter month..
A great place to calm and away from city chaos..
